Fault.name: BPEL/AsyncProcess.bpel
Fault.msg: The from-spec of "xsd:string" is not compatible with to-spec of "client:processResponse"

Fault.name: BPEL/CallAsync.bpel
Fault.fix: Fix the process to be *either* durable or synchronous.
Fault.msg: Process "CallAsync" is both durable (onMessage,Receive,Wait) and synchronous.

Fault.name: BPEL/CallAsync.bpel
Fault.msg: The from-spec of "ns1:processResponse" is not compatible with to-spec of "xsd:string"
